General.Name: NeutriSci International Inc
General.Description: NeutriSci International Inc. develops and markets nutraceutical products in Canada, Germany, and Japan. It offers neuenergy, an energy tab designed to deliver enhanced focus and mental clarity. The company sells its products through a distribution network of retail storefront and online markets. NeutriSci International Inc. was incorporated in 2009 and is headquartered in Vancouver, Canada.
General.Address: 333 West Wacker Drive, Chicago, IL, United States, 60606-1220
